description:
CONTENTS - In The Friendly Swede retail packaging:3 x Premium branded 5.5" universal stylus pens in stainless steel and aluminum, no plastic parts, real pen feeling - Choose your three favorite colors!3 x Replaceable rubber tips2 x 15" Detachable elastic tether strings1 x The Friendly Swede microfiber cleaning cloth 5.5x3.0"Note:Compared with regular capacitive stylus tips, The Friendly Swede thin tip is more narrow BUT not to be confused with fine point stylus tip!The Friendly Swede thin tip radius - 0.12 inchRegular capacitive stylus tips - 0.20 inchSize of rubber tip do NOT vary!GENERAL ADVICE:"..due to the non-durable nature of the capacitive touchscreen (iPad, smartphones, etc.) the tip has to be soft. 
Treat the stylus like a small, soft-tipped paint brush and stroke the screen.
If the tip is collapsing or if you tore the tip off quickly, they you trying to write with the stylus versus stroking the screen..""..Soft tip styli do not last. 3-6 months of daily use and they are done....product is disposable.."COMPATIBLE WITH:Amazon Kindle, Amazon Kindle Fire, Apple iPhone 3 3G 4 4G 4GS, iPod Touch 3rd and 4th Generation, iPad 1 & 2 & many other similar touch screen devices.THE FRIENDLY SWEDE - Selected Accessories:If you for any reason are not happy with any product by The Friendly Swede, please do not hesitate to contact us and will do our best to solve your problem asap!
At The friendly Swede we take full ownership and responsibility for the quality of our products. The Friendly Swede - USPTO serial: 85494642, 85511082, 85521942 - is a registered trademark protected by US Trademark Law. 
All products by The Friendly Swede are exclusively manufactured by The Friendly Swede
title: Bundle of 3PCS Premium Branded 5.5" Thin-Tip High Precision Universal Capacitive Stylus Pens + Extra 3 Replaceable Tips and 2 X 15" Detachable Elastic Lanyards (Red/Black/Green)
